sqlMap.select:
select count(*) totcnt from tsys_message where msg_id like concat('%'||coalesce(#msgId#,'')||'%')
and msgdiv_cd = #msgdivCd#
and taskdiv_cd = #taskdivCd#

select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (order by msg_id) as rowno ,msg_id as msgId ,taskdiv_cd as taskdivCd ,(select cd_nm from tsys_code where co_id = #sessionCoId# and com_cd = taskdiv_cd) as taskdivNm ,msgdiv_cd as msgdivCd ,(select cd_nm from tsys_code where co_id = #sessionCoId# and com_cd = msgdiv_cd) as msgdivNm ,msg_cts as msgCts ,msg_cts_eng as msgengCts ,msg_cts_jp as msgjpCts ,case use_yn when '1' then '사용' else '미사용' end as useYn ,regpsn_id as regId ,to_char(reg_dtm, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as regDt ,upd_id as updId ,to_char(upd_dtm, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as updDt from tsys_message where (msg_id like concat('%'||coalesce(#msgId#,'')||'%') or msg_cts like concat('%'||coalesce(#msgId#,'')||'%'))
and msgdiv_cd = #msgdivCd#
and taskdiv_cd = #taskdivCd#
order by msg_id
sqlMap.update: update tsys_message set msg_id =#msgId# ,taskdiv_cd =#taskdivCd# ,msgdiv_cd =#msgdivCd# ,msg_cts =#msgCts# ,msg_cts_eng=#msgengCts# ,msg_cts_jp =#msgjpCts# ,use_yn =#useYn# ,upd_id =#sessionUserId# ,upd_dtm =now() where msg_id = #msgId#
